column4: Hi yesturday i have updated to 7.10 of the ubuntu os now the problem was and is that i do not have sound on my com i would say its a driver problem but what do u guys think it is
YO probably dont remember if you recompiled alsa to get it going on 7/04 but if you did, then you would need to do it abain
if you type  /join #alsa  they can probably sort it quickly  .. they handle sound for that release
